meanings.sent1: The family tree shows the different lineages of our ancestors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the lineages of various animal species to understand their evolution.
meanings.sent3: It's fascinating to trace the lineages of our family pets back to their wild ancestors.
meanings.sent4: The lineages of ancient civilizations can be seen in the ruins they left behind.
meanings.sent5: The lineages of plants can reveal interesting patterns of adaptation over time.

meanings.definition: A sequence of species each of which is considered to have evolved from its predecessor.
meanings.sent1: The fossil record provides evidence of the lineages of different dinosaur species.
meanings.sent2: Biologists study the lineages of birds to understand how they have diversified over time.
meanings.sent3: In a fictional world, the lineages of mythical creatures can be traced through ancient texts.
meanings.sent4: The lineages of cars can be seen in how design features evolve from one model to the next.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the lineages of languages can reveal fascinating connections between different cultures.
